basic_information.total_customers_source: PROVIDED - 8,000 HNW clients confirmed by client.
basic_information.cost_to_income_source: ESTIMATE - Typical EMEA wealth management CTI 65-75%. Using 70%.
basic_information.operating_costs_source: DERIVED - $120M revenue x 70% CTI = $84M operating costs.
basic_information.average_fte_rate_source: DERIVED - RM cost $120K/year / 2,000 working hours = $60/hr. Used as primary rate since RM admin reduction is core value driver.
basic_information.average_revenue_per_customer_source: PROVIDED - Client confirmed $15,000 revenue per HNW client.

backbase_loading.notes: Wealth management adoption curve. Slower ramp than retail due to HNW client sensitivity and RM change management.

conservative.description: Slower adoption, cautious RM change management, minimal cross-sell uplift

moderate.description: Standard adoption with structured RM enablement program

aggressive.description: Fast adoption with strong executive sponsorship and RM incentive alignment

client_onboarding.current_state: 3-week onboarding cycle (KYC, AML, suitability, account setup, portfolio transfer)
client_onboarding.target_state: 1-week digital-first onboarding with e-KYC and automated suitability
transcript_quotes: Current onboarding takes 3 weeks end-to-end — Client Input (W1)
We lose prospects during the lengthy process — Client Input (W2)

time_to_revenue_acceleration.name: Accelerate Time-to-Revenue for New Clients
time_to_revenue_acceleration.description: Reducing onboarding from 3 weeks to 1 week gets new client AUM invested 2 weeks sooner

new_clients_per_year.source: ESTIMATE - 10% annual growth on 8,000 client base.

annual_fee_rate.source: DERIVED - $15,000 revenue / $1.5M AUM = 1.0% blended fee rate.

weeks_saved.source: TARGET - From 3 weeks to 1 week onboarding.

prospect_recovery.name: Recover Abandoning Prospects
prospect_recovery.description: Faster, digital onboarding reduces prospect drop-off during lengthy KYC process

annual_prospects.source: ESTIMATE - 800 net new clients implies ~920 initial prospects (15% abandonment).

current_abandonment_rate.source: ESTIMATE - 15% drop-off during 3-week onboarding for HNW segment.

backbase_recovery_rate.source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Digital onboarding recovers 25-35% of abandoning prospects.

revenue_per_client.source: PROVIDED - $15,000 annual revenue per HNW client.

reduce_onboarding_processing.name: Reduce Onboarding Processing Cost
reduce_onboarding_processing.description: Digital KYC, e-signatures, and automated suitability checks reduce manual processing from 20 to 8 hours per client

current_processing_hours.source: ESTIMATE - 3-week process: KYC checks (6h), document collection (4h), suitability review (3h), account setup (4h), portfolio transfer (3h).

target_processing_hours.source: ESTIMATE - Digital-first: e-KYC (2h), digital doc upload (1h), automated suitability (1h), system setup (2h), portfolio transfer (2h).

digital_engagement.current_state: Poor digital experience — clients rely on RM calls/meetings for portfolio updates, reporting, and routine requests
digital_engagement.target_state: Self-service wealth portal with real-time portfolio views, digital reporting, and secure messaging
transcript_quotes: Our digital offering is poor — clients call RMs for basic portfolio questions — Client Input (W3)
We need to improve digital engagement to retain next-gen wealth clients — Client Input (W4)

client_retention.name: Improved Client Retention Through Digital Engagement
client_retention.description: Better digital experience reduces HNW client attrition from 5% to 3.5%

current_annual_churn.source: ESTIMATE - 5% annual attrition is typical for HNW segment without strong digital offering.

churn_reduction.source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Digital engagement reduces churn by 1-2 percentage points.

digital_cross_sell.name: Digital Cross-Sell and Share of Wallet
digital_cross_sell.description: Wealth portal surfaces investment opportunities and nudges, driving incremental product adoption

cross_sell_success_rate.source: ESTIMATE - 5% of clients adopt additional product via digital channel annually.

incremental_revenue_per_success.source: ESTIMATE - Incremental fee from additional product (advisory mandate, insurance, structured product).

rm_servicing.current_state: RMs spend 60% of time on admin tasks (reporting, compliance, data entry, meeting prep)
rm_servicing.target_state: Reduce admin to 30% of RM time through automation, freeing capacity for client-facing activities
transcript_quotes: Our RMs spend 60% of their time on admin, target is 30% — Client Input (W5)
Manual reporting is a huge time sink for the team — Client Input (W6)

tasks.volume_source: DERIVED - 8,000 clients x 4 quarterly reports = 32,000 reports/year.
tasks.time_source: ESTIMATE - 45 min per manual report (data pull, formatting, review).
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Automated portfolio reporting engine generates 60% of reports.

tasks.volume_source: ESTIMATE - ~625 RMs requests per year across 50 RMs.
tasks.time_source: ESTIMATE - 30 min for custom data extraction and formatting.
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Self-service dashboards handle 50% of ad-hoc requests.

tasks.time_source: ESTIMATE - 90 min for analysis, model run, proposal document.
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Template-driven proposals with pre-populated data save 30%.

tasks.volume_source: ESTIMATE - Avg 2.25 inquiries per client per year.
tasks.time_source: ESTIMATE - 15 min per inquiry (check portfolio, compose response).
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Self-service portal with real-time portfolio views deflects 70%.

tasks.volume_source: ESTIMATE - ~1.75 trade-related requests per client per year.
tasks.time_source: ESTIMATE - 20 min per request (verify, execute, confirm).
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Digital trade initiation handles 40% of routine requests.

tasks.volume_source: ESTIMATE - 1 document request per client per year.
tasks.time_source: ESTIMATE - 10 min to retrieve and send documents.
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Document vault with self-service access eliminates 80%.

tasks.volume_source: ESTIMATE - 1 annual review meeting per client.
tasks.time_source: ESTIMATE - 30 min prep (agenda, portfolio summary, talking points).
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Auto-generated meeting packs with portfolio analytics save 35%.

tasks.time_source: ESTIMATE - 90 min per review (screening, document check, risk assessment).
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Automated screening and digital document verification reduce effort by 40%.

tasks.volume_source: ESTIMATE - Address changes, beneficiary updates, mandate changes.
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Client self-service for routine updates.

tasks.volume_source: ESTIMATE - Suitability reports, best-execution records, MiFID compliance.
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Automated suitability and compliance record generation.

tasks.volume_source: ESTIMATE - CRM updates, portfolio system entries, manual reconciliations.
tasks.time_source: ESTIMATE - 45 min per batch of manual entries.
tasks.impact_source: BACKBASE BENCHMARK - API integrations and auto-sync eliminate 55% of manual data work.

license.source: ESTIMATE - Backbase Wealth Management platform license for 8,000 HNW clients + 50 RM workstations. REQUIRES COMMERCIAL VALIDATION.

implementation.source: ESTIMATE - Wealth portal + RM workbench + client onboarding + reporting engine + integrations. REQUIRES SCOPING VALIDATION.

summary.notes: Benefits shown at 100% implementation and effectiveness. Year-by-year values apply adoption curves. Additional upside not modeled: freed RM capacity enables higher client-to-RM ratio (160 → 200+) and revenue growth from deeper client relationships.

assumptions_register.sensitivity: HIGH - Determines average AUM per client and fee income
HIGH - Core financial metric for retention and cross-sell benefits
HIGH - Defines total admin hours available for reduction
HIGH - Affects all servicing cost calculations

assumptions_register.source: PROVIDED - Client confirmed RMs spend 60% on admin.
assumptions_register.sensitivity: HIGH - Defines baseline for admin reduction
HIGH - Defines benefit ceiling for admin reduction
HIGH - Core driver of onboarding time-to-revenue benefit

assumptions_register.source: ESTIMATE - Typical HNW churn without strong digital offering. REQUIRES VALIDATION.
assumptions_register.sensitivity: HIGH - Core driver of retention benefit

assumptions_register.source: ESTIMATE - Based on typical HNW growth rates.
ESTIMATE - Conservative assumption for digital cross-sell. REQUIRES VALIDATION.
BACKBASE BENCHMARK - Wealth management adoption curve, slower than retail.
assumptions_register.sensitivity: MEDIUM - Affects timing of benefit realization

data_gaps_for_validation.data_needed: Actual client attrition rate and reasons
data_gaps_for_validation.impact: Core input for retention benefit — currently estimated at 5%

data_gaps_for_validation.data_needed: RM time allocation breakdown by activity
data_gaps_for_validation.source: RM time study or CRM activity logs
data_gaps_for_validation.impact: Validates the 60% admin baseline and sizes each servicing task correctly

data_gaps_for_validation.data_needed: Client onboarding funnel data (prospects, drop-offs, completion rate)
data_gaps_for_validation.impact: Sizes the prospect recovery benefit — abandonment rate currently estimated

data_gaps_for_validation.data_needed: Actual onboarding processing hours per client
data_gaps_for_validation.impact: Sizes onboarding cost reduction — currently estimated at 20 hours

data_gaps_for_validation.data_needed: Report generation volume and time per report by type
data_gaps_for_validation.source: Portfolio management team / reporting system logs
data_gaps_for_validation.impact: Core input for portfolio reporting automation benefit

data_gaps_for_validation.data_needed: Client inquiry volume by channel (calls, emails, portal)
Current digital adoption rate among HNW clients
data_gaps_for_validation.source: Digital analytics / client portal usage data
data_gaps_for_validation.impact: Defines baseline for digital engagement improvement

data_gaps_for_validation.data_needed: Cross-sell success rate and incremental revenue per product
Compliance and KYC review frequency and effort per client
